resources.string: Calculate your dog\'s age in human years!
Your dog\'s age in human years is:
Loading a random fact about dogs...
Mobile Programming with Native Technologies ID00CS48-3002 (Spring 2023)
This mobile application helps you to determine how old your dog is in human years by using a simple calculation method provided by the American Kennel Club (AKC). Source:
Additionally, the program provides a fun and educational element by retrieving a random dog fact from the animality API.
Click this link to read the study.
Click here to read the full documentation of the API.
How does the calculation actually work?
There is no universal rule for calculating your dog’s age since other factors such as breed also affect it, but you can get a close estimate by using this calculator.
As a general guideline, though, the American Veterinary Medical Association breaks it down like this:
15 human years equals the first year of a medium-sized dog’s life.
Year two for a dog equals about nine years for a human.
And after that, each human year would be approximately five years for a dog.
